Text.val: in order to get the same rsult if the program runs under windows or under I5,
the format in the I/O is set to 'None' and at the end of every line in the form
the - CHR(13) & CHR(10) string was added.

Switch system language to GB laguage , in which report has to be produced

STP.TXT: GNRD - G E N E R A L D I R E C T O R Y (ENTRY 85) I S E M P T Y

Text.val: check if client is insured for debtor risks

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select cast(sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) * -1 as decimal(13,2))
from :1/lgcc join :1/ldgr on LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO = LDGR_ADMNO and LGCC_LDGR_NO = LDGR_NO
where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and substr(LGCC_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and substr(LGCC_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 1
union
select cast(sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) * -1 as decimal(13,2))
from :1/lgcc join :1/ldgr on LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO = LDGR_ADMNO and LGCC_LDGR_NO = LDGR_NO
where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and substr(LGCC_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and substr(LGCC_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 3
union
select cast(sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) * -1 as decimal(13,2))
from :1/lgcc join :1/ldgr on LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO = LDGR_ADMNO and LGCC_LDGR_NO = LDGR_NO
where LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and substr(LGCC_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and substr(LGCC_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 4

Text.val: there will be always only 4 records (3 SQL unions), one row see T.S.
